docs.text: qg-cms-frontend A fun project I am working on to learn more about Strapi to create a headless personal CMS site. That will have a frontednd created in NextJs This will power qgriffith.com Commands npm install - Install all the needed node packages npm run develop - Start the development server npm run build - Build the site for production npm run start - Start the production server Project layout render.yml # The deployment file. qg-cms/ # Strapi Project src/ # Strapi API and Controllers env/ # Enviroment config Deployment This project is deployed using render
